channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call center early closure
item.description: Due to an extraordinary update intervention, Thursday 31st October the University call center 02 5032 5032 will stop the service at 2 p.m.%0AThe service will resume Monday 4th November 9.00 a.m.%0A

item.title: Upcoming strike
item.description: On Thursday, 31 October there may be service disruptions due to a general strike. However, this will not affect the following services: final exams for Bachelor‚Äôs and Master‚Äôs degrees, postgraduate schools and PhD programmes, issuing of urgent certificates.%0A

item.title: Study awards in memory of G. Beani and R. Sampietro
item.description: The University of Milan has established 2 study awards in memory of Dr. Giannino Beani and Prof. Roberto Sampietro, each in the amount of ‚Ç¨2,000, for students enrolled on-track in the third year of a single-cycle Master's degree programme in Medicine and Surgery.%0AApplication deadline: 13 December 2024%0A%0Aüîó Call for applications 2024/2025

item.title: Virgilio Program 2024/25: ranking list
item.description: The Selection Committee for the Virgilio Program 2024-25 gathered on 18 September 2024 at 8.30 am to screen applications and select applicants. Please find below the final ranking list, including the names of all applicants selected for the Virgilio Program 2024-25. %0A%0AüìÑ Ranking list 2024-25
